name: Brussels Sprouts
keywords: brussels sprouts, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 10 ounces brussels sprouts, washed and trimmed

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the sprouts for about 10 minutes until they soften but are still crunchy. Drain, cut into quarters or halves, and place in serving bowl with the sugar. Stir to dissolve the sugar.
